DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study assess seropersistence TBE virus antibody child , adolescent young adult receive first booster vaccination either FSME-IMMUN 0.25 mL Junior FSME-IMMUN 0.5 mL precursor Study 700401 .
DOC.brief_title: Tick-Borne Encephalitis ( TBE ) Seropersistence After First Booster Children , Adolescents Young Adults ( Follow-Up Study 700401 )
